DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the concurrent validity of a newly developed pneumatic, fMRI compatible muscle vibrator as compared to a electromagnetic muscle vibrator in the stimulation of muscle proprioceptors.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Pneumatic and Electromagnetic Muscle Vibrators to Stimulate Muscle Proprioceptors
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria for healthy individuals: Age: 2045 years old No history of low back pain A score of 0% on the Oswestry Disability Index Willingness to sign the informed consent History of major trauma and/or major orthopedic surgery of the spine, pelvis or lower quadrant One of the following conditions: Parkinson, MS, Stroke with sequels.... Radicular symptoms Not Dutchspeaking Strong opioids Neck pain Ankle problems Smoking
